original: Lindhagen, Curt Engelbrekt, läroverksadjunkt, Göteborg, f. 18/4/06 i Eskilstuna av förv. C. A. L. o. Hilma Karolina Hellquist. G. 37 m. Margit Arnéus. Barn: Gunilla f. 40, Eva 44. — Stud:ex. i Eskilstuna 25, fil. kand. i Upps. 28, fil. mag. 29, teol. kand. 40, teol. lic. 43, provår 41. Tim-lär. v. Sigtuna human, lärov. 35-40, Upps. h. a. 1. 41-42, adj. i kristend:-kunsk. o. hist. m. samh :lära v. Hvit-feldtska h. a. 1. i Gbg sed. 43. Skr.: upps. o. rec. i facktidskr.
translated: Lindhagen, Curt Engelbrekt, high school teacher, Gothenburg, born on April 18, 1906 in Eskilstuna to unregistered C.A.L. and Hilma Karolina Hellquist. Married in 1937 to Margit Arnéus. Children: Gunilla born in 1940, Eva in 1944. Education: High school graduate in Eskilstuna in 1925, Bachelor of Philosophy in Uppsala in 1928, Master of Philosophy in 1929, Bachelor of Theology in 1940, Licensed Theologist in 1943, probationary year in 1941. Temporary teacher at Sigtuna High School from 1935-1940, temporary assistant teacher at Uppsala High School from 1941-1942, assistant teacher in Christian knowledge, history, and social science at Hvitfeldtska High School in Gothenburg since 1943. Published research and reviews in academic journals.
